fields.label: Journal Header
fields.name: journal_header
fields.instructions: Select what type of header you would like to use for the article

fields.label: Flip Layout Direction
fields.name: flip_layout_direction
fields.instructions: set to Yes if you would like to reverse the header direction

fields.label: Spotlight Style
fields.name: spotlight_style
fields.instructions: select what style you would like the spotlight header to be displayed as

fields.label: Typography Style
fields.name: typography_style
fields.instructions: Select if you would like the headers to be serif or sans serif

fields.label: Text Align
fields.name: text_align
fields.instructions: select how you would like your text to be aligned

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: quote
sub_fields.instructions: Set to true if you want this section of text to be a quote

sub_fields.label: Align Text Center
sub_fields.name: align_text_center
sub_fields.instructions: set to yes if you would like the text to be center aligned.

sub_fields.label: Layout Options
sub_fields.name: layout_options
sub_fields.instructions: Select what type of layout this section of text should have.

sub_fields.label: Side Bar Options
sub_fields.name: side_bar_options
sub_fields.instructions: Select what content you would like to add to the side area. You can leave it empty if you don't want to display anything here. If this is the first block on your article please select the Articles Details option.

sub_fields.label: Block Alignment
sub_fields.name: block_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Select if you want to display this section to the left or the right.

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: quote
sub_fields.instructions: Set to true if you want this section of text to be a quote

sub_fields.label: Align Text Center
sub_fields.name: align_text_center
sub_fields.instructions: set to yes if you would like the text to be center aligned.

sub_fields.label: Discovery Layout
sub_fields.name: discovery_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Please select if you would like a grid or list view for this section

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Please ensure that the image you upload is a portrait image.

sub_fields.label: Label
sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.instructions: The label used for the following link e.g. "Shop Now"

sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: This is the URL that you would like to direct the user to

sub_fields.label: Link Text
sub_fields.name: link_text
sub_fields.instructions: This is the text that would show to the user, this helps neaten up urls
